paragraphs.heading: *No termination*
paragraphs.content: Each Party waives the right to (seek to) rescind (*ontbinden*), nullify (*vernietigen*) or otherwise terminate or amend this Agreement, in whole or in part, in or out of court.

paragraphs.heading: No assignment
paragraphs.content: No Party shall be entitled to assign or transfer, whether legally (*goederenrechtelijke werking*) or contractually (*verbintenisrechtelijke werking*), all or any part of its rights and/or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of all other Parties. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to assign or transfer, whether in whole or in part, this Agreement or any of its rights and/or obligations under this Agreement to any of its affiliates, subsidiaries, or other group companies, without requiring the Receiving Party's consent. Any assignment or transfer of this Agreement in violation of this clause shall be deemed null and void and shall have no legal effect.

paragraphs.heading: *Entire agreement*
paragraphs.content: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties concerning the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior agreements and understandings with respect to that subject matter.

paragraphs.heading: *Invalidity*
paragraphs.content: If any term or provision of this Agreement is found by a court or arbitral tribunal of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining terms and provisions shall remain in full force and effect. In such a case, the Parties shall use their best efforts to replace the invalid, illegal, or unenforceable provision with a valid and enforceable provision that, to the greatest extent possible, achieves the same legal and commercial effect as intended by the original provision.

paragraphs.heading: *Amendment*
paragraphs.content: Any amendment or variation of this Agreement is not valid, unless mutually agreed between all Parties in writing.

paragraphs.heading: *Waiver*
paragraphs.content: A Party's failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement shall neither be construed as a waiver of the provision nor prevent the Party from enforcing any other provision of this Agreement. No Party shall be deemed to have waived any of its rights under this Agreement, unless such waiver has been made explicitly and in writing.

paragraphs.heading: *Governing law*
paragraphs.content: This Agreement and any non-contractual obligations arising out of or in connection with it, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands.

paragraphs.heading: *Dispute resolution*
paragraphs.content: Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall in first instance be exclusively submitted to the competent courts in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

paragraphs.heading: *Counterparts*
paragraphs.content: This Agreement may be signed through electronic signatures, or in one or more counterpart originals, each of which shall constitute an original document, but all of which together constitute one and the same agreement.
